ai_decisions.style_reasoning: CTA for Instagram Stories needs to be highly visible and actionable. 'Follow for more!' should pop with vibrant colors and a bold, attention-grabbing font. The pulsing animation adds urgency and movement, encouraging immediate action. Dark stroke and shadow ensure readability against various backgrounds.
ai_decisions.color_psychology: Utilizes bright yellow (happiness, attention) and vibrant magenta (fun, viral, trendy) for maximum visibility and to align with Instagram's aesthetic. The high contrast between yellow text and magenta background meets accessibility requirements and grabs attention.

ai_decisions.style_reasoning: Montserrat Bold provides a modern and approachable feel, suitable for Instagram's aesthetic. The large font size and 'pulse' animation grab attention. A bright orange background signifies urgency and excitement, encouraging immediate action. White text with a black stroke and shadow ensures high contrast and readability against the vibrant background, meeting accessibility requirements. Two words per line keep it concise for quick consumption on Stories.
ai_decisions.color_psychology: Orange (background) is associated with excitement, enthusiasm, and urgency, effectively prompting users to follow. White (text) provides excellent contrast against the orange, ensuring legibility. The black stroke and shadow further enhance contrast and readability, meeting WCAG AAA contrast ratio requirements.
